title: Phantom Footfalls
story: The grand halls echo with phantom steps, making it difficult to discern friend from foe, or even which way is forward.
effect: While this card is active, whenever a hero moves into a room that already contains another hero, the moving hero must immediately roll a D6. On a result of 1-2, they are disoriented and lose 1 Sanity. Furthermore, if Lord Godalming or Quincey Morris performs a Combat action while in the same room as another hero, they must immediately lose 1 Health.
